param.name: do_defrag
param.label: Gene family defragmentation
param.help: Realign gene families to link fragments with their non-fragmented gene family. (--no_defrag)

param.label: Number of classes used to partition the pangenome
param.help: If empty value (default), it will be automatically determined. Otherwise, the value needs to be between 2 and 20 and it is advised to set a value of 3. See the link for the documentation in the help section for more details.

validator.message: Value needs to be empty or an integer between 2 and 20

param.label: Soft core threshold used when generating general statistics on the projected genome
param.help: Default=0.95 .This threshold does not influence PPanGGOLiN's partitioning. The value determines the minimum fraction of genomes that must possess a gene family for it to be considered part of the soft core.

param.name: genomes
param.label: Genome files
param.help: All the genome files must be of the same format, either all genbank files or all fasta files. A minimum of @MIN@ genome file(s) is mandatory.@EXTRATEXTHELP@ Special characters and spaces are replaced by underscore.
